segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children near the open cabinet, up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is climbing on what looks like a very wobbly two-step stool, precariously balanced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching, reaching deep into that 'COOKIE JAR', a hand full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out; it looks like it could tip at any given moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm actually quite worried he's going to fall backwards and injure himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, either to catch the cookies or to act as a makeshift lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is nearby, her hand outstretched, clearly anticipating a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their secret mission, completely absorbed in the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, isn't it, a covert operation for cookies?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The precariousness of his perch on that unstable stool gives me a slight chill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stabilize that stool before he gets hurt, it's an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get their cookies without any unfortunate incidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is completely oblivious to their daring adventure behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR
